current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To allow for a contract for operation of Melville Hall of United States Merchant Marine Academy
			 after gift by United States Merchant Marine Academy Alumni Association and
			 Foundation, Inc., for renovation of such hall and for other purposes.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the

committee-name.#text: Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation
